src/lib/components/DashJsonGrid.react.js.description:
DashJsonGrid is a Dash porting version for the React component:
`react-json-grid/JSONGrid`

This component provides a JSON Grid viewer used for viewing complicated and
unstructured serializable JSON data.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

class_name.description: Often used with CSS to style elements with common properties.

style.description: Defines CSS styles which will override styles previously set.

data.description: The JSON-serializable data to be transformed into a grid table.

default_expand_depth.description: The depth to which the grid is expanded by default.

default_expand_key_tree.description:
Tree-like structure with all keys that needs to be expanded. This structure needs
to be a `Mapping` mimicing the structure of the data.

selected_path.description:
`keyPath` captured by the `onSelect` method of the grid viewer. This value is a
sequence of indicies used for locating the element of the selected data.
Due to the limitation of the exported functionalities, this value cannot be
reset by the callback. In other words, using it with callbacks.Output will
not take effects.

highlight_selected.description: Whether to highlight the selected item or not.

search_text.description: The text that needs to be searched in the JSON data.

bgColor.name: string
bgColor.description: Background color of the whole grid view.

borderColor.name: string
borderColor.description: Border color of the whole grid view.

tableHeaderBgColor.name: string
tableHeaderBgColor.description: Background color of the table header.

tableIconColor.name: string
tableIconColor.description: Text color of the icon in the table header.

selectHighlightBgColor.name: string
selectHighlightBgColor.description: Background color when this part is highlighted by the selection.

searchHighlightBgColor.name: string
searchHighlightBgColor.description: Background color of the part highlighted by the search.

theme.description:
The theme (name) that needs to be applied. If a `Mapping` is specified, will
customize the color code of each part of grid viewer.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

is_loading.name: bool
is_loading.description: Determines if the component is loading or not

component_name.name: string
component_name.description: Holds the name of the component that is loading

loading_state.description: Object that holds the loading state object coming from dash-renderer
